page.title: 12FORTON PEOPLE'S JOBS
page.content: We did a survey on the jobs of the mums and dads of the children. There are about sixty families altogether and eighty-five children. { Dads Jobs Engineer 6 Bank Manager1 Computer Mechanic 1 Farmer 5 Insurance Manager 1 Vet 1 Builder 8 Plastics Diving Instructor 1 Manager 1 Funeral Director 1 Unemployed 2 Paper Mill 1 Director Of Smoked Food1{(continued on Surveyor 1 {page 13) Director Of Car Company1 Mechanic 2 University Lecturer 3 Garden Nurseries Owner 1 Butcher 1 Caravan Salesman 1 Wallpaper Salesman 1 Soliciter 1
